title: Personal Training
text: Personal Training is available with one of our licensed professionals on an appointment basis. Our Trainers will assess you and design a program to help you meet your personal goals and objectives. We offer both 30 minute and 55 minute sessions.

title: Cardio & Strength
text: Lenox Fit features machines and equipment from Life Fitness including 6 brand new treadmills that feature free classes, ellipticals, stationary bikes, recumbent bikes, 2 Concept 2 Rowing Machines, a Concept 2 Ski Erg, a Power Mill, a lateral Elliptical, an assault bike, a Technogym self propelled Treadmill as well as a full selection of strength circuit equipment by Life Fitness and Cybex.

title: Free Weights
text: Lenox Fit offers equipment by Hammer Strength, Life Fitness and Rogue including adjustable benches, a squat rack, a Smith Machine, a full rack of fixed barbells, urethane dumbbells as well as ergonomic handles and standard handles for our cable machine. We also have a wide variety of Functional Strength equipment including TRX, rope pull, bands, medicine balls, core balls, kettlebells, Bosu, jump ropes, balance pads and more.
